website_summaries.verdict: Once it's up and running, McAfee Internet Security 2009 is competitive with Norton on speed, detection, and removal of malicious software.
pros: McAfee Internet Security 2009 is faster and lighter than last year's version with better malicious software detection and removal capabilities
cons: McAfee Internet Security 2009 stumbles a bit on installation and technical support

customer_reviews.title: GOOD VALUE
customer_reviews.text: Although this is an older version, it still works well and is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: S. E. LOPEZ

customer_reviews.title: No luck with installation
customer_reviews.text: I've never encountered software that simply would not install. I kept receiving error messages asking me to uninstall Lavasoft's Ad-Aware, which I actually haven't had on the computer for a couple years. Many, many searches failed to turn up the program, even when using CCleaner and Revo Uninstall. I even tried re-installing then uninstalling the offending program, but to no avail -- apparently it exists only in McAfee's imagination. I returned the software and just switched to AVG. Such a waste of time. Boo, McAfee.
customer_reviews.author: Jengaworld

customer_reviews.title: 95% Pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I rate the site 100%. I received the DVD within a week. Which was considerably early. I also would buy future items with this site. However, I want to tell you about the McAfee Product. He is very good with scans, etc. The downfall with this protection is the length it does take to do a full scan. I have DSL internet, which is considered a fast speed. My new computer has a 4GB memory, and it still takes from 2 to 3 HOURS to complete. Other than that, the security is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: BEVERLY A. CARROLL

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: I have used McAfee for years with no problems. I purchaed this so I could ad another computer. Everything went well, but you need to watch McAfee. They can't seem to understand when you switch from 1 user to 3 user that they shouldn't shouldn't charge for the 1 user when it expires. Sometimes if you are surfing the next and the auto virus scan starts it will lock up Internet Explorer. I have noticed this with IE 8.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good but not much different
customer_reviews.text: This is a great anti-virus. But I can't hardly notice anything different from last years. Its virus detection is basically the same. Although i have had any recently. The only new key feature that I notice was McAfee easy share which lets you easily set up a network and make it secure to transfer data between you computers. Other then that that pretty much sums it up. It is a good anti-virus just not much more to add to the table.
customer_reviews.author: J. McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: McAfee Internet Security 2009, 3 users
customer_reviews.text: bought thru private owner from Amazon, product box didn't have barcode. Wouldn't buy it if the owner put out a note or mentioned it. Basically the owner was dis-honest and withdrew the information. It worked only a month after installing it, it kept asking to update the product (even the product supposely lasts for 1 year) and hung, then stopped & froze the computer. Basically if you don't update the product, it won't allow you to continue or use the computer. BAD PRODUCT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Chang

customer_reviews.title: Personal Review of McAfe Total Security 2009
customer_reviews.text: The CD does not auto install. But, it's easy to navigate to the drive and invoke the install manually. I haven't been running it more than a week, but it seems to use more system resources than I'd like. The system has noticebly slowed down. Unfortunately, I also upgraded Internet Explorer to version 8 about the same time. The sluggishness of the system may be due to both products.
customer_reviews.author: Barry E Greene

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the McAfee Internet Security 2009 (3-Users) as a renewal of my about-to-expire 2 year McAfee that came pre-installed with my Dell laptop in 2007. Installation was smooth, with no single problem. Even for my wife's laptop (with Japanese Vista OS) having 2008 Japanese version, we got no problems. Automatically, our respective registration numbers (U.S.'s & Japan's) were retained. So far, we've had no single operation problem. We like it, considering the price at which we bought it and the license for 3 users.
customer_reviews.author: Mwananchi

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE SPAM FILTER AND  SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: The spam filteR is worthless. If it is on high, everything including E MAILS you want goes into the spam box . If it is on medium, everything goes into the in box, even senders you want blocked. So basically, the filter does nothing. I had seven contacts and wasted 7 hours with their India tech support. They could not fix it. They made three promises to call me with higher level team 2 and team 2.5 support. I waited by the phone three evenings and no one ever called. Always technical difficulties. The only technical difficulty is their spam filter and their baloney excuses. DO NOT BUY THIS IF YOU WANT A SPAM FILTER.
customer_reviews.author: skeptic

customer_reviews.title: does its job
customer_reviews.text: pretty ok product,takes awhile get updates,and you have to take automatic updating off because every time you get online it will try to update,and since it takes up so many resources you cant do anything else but wait,so go to your options and take off automatic updating,beside from that it doesnt work all that well with AOL.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Jackson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: McAfee Internet Security 2009 3-User
customer_reviews.text: Bought this originally for my desktop, and two laptops. After using it for a while, as with Norton, this tends to hog up memory. Came across the Webroot product, and ended up using that in lieu of McAfee once my McAfee subscription expired.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Good, But.......
customer_reviews.text: I feel it's a very good product but, needs work on the Vista 64 bit end.It sometimes self closes anti-virus and other securities.I've used this program on 32 bit Vista with no problems but, with 64 bit Vista, it sometimes just glitches and shuts down the anti-virus protection.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. G.

customer_reviews.title: bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: I received the cd with no plastic wrap around the box and the box has been opened before. There is no keys/code or any installation guide. the box has been shipped from the return center shown on the shipper's address on the envelope. I already returned it back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ai Zhou

customer_reviews.title: Still the Best Antivirus
customer_reviews.text: I recieved this product on time and followed the directions on the box. They were not exactly correct. It seems that no matter what you should uninstall the old product first and then install the new product. Otherwise its a great antivirus that does not slow down your computer like others do.
customer_reviews.author: FrequentBuyer

customer_reviews.title: virus
customer_reviews.text: I bought XPS M1330 from Dell and of course it only runs Visa (can't go back to XP and can't move on to Windows 7). I must purchase this McAfee for my Windows Vista. After installed it and my sister was using my labtop and browse on the internet... *boom* Windows automatic shutdown and restart..... (failure....) I reinstall fresh windows Vista and this McAfee.... on/off I still haven't see windows come up right.... I don't know if this MCAfee can protect virus to my boot sector... seems like there is virus it can't detect it.... waste of money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: T. Pham

customer_reviews.title: Installed on two computers
customer_reviews.text: I needed a virus protection for a new desktop that I purchased while at the same time, my virus protection software for my laptop was ready to expire. I installed McAfee Internet Security on both computers. What a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: geraldo

customer_reviews.title: Horrible support!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to replace a Norton/Symantec product. As much as I dislike Norton I have found McAfee to be much worse. The customer support is absolutely USELESS! Do not waste your money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Byrd Cpa

customer_reviews.title: Decent product, it works, but Amazon shipped it smashed
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied with the actual software that is installed, but I am giving this product only 3 stars because Amazon.com shipped it in a fragile thin container and the product box arrived completely smashed. The actual CD inside was not damaged, but my initial impression of the product was pretty bad. Amazon should have really figured out a cheap way to get this out. The box looks like someone sat on it.
customer_reviews.author: letshavepaneer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your $
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on recommendation from a tech, hated it, it screwed up my system. I was then told by another tech not to ever buy this. SOOOO.... I returned it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: That Girl

customer_reviews.title: Do its job
customer_reviews.text: Functions well but occupied a lot of memory space. It seems idle the machine when it is scanning in the startup process. Constantly connect online to update the virus data base.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Durham 2017

customer_reviews.title: Excellent replacement for Norton Internet Security
customer_reviews.text: After using Norton products for years, it is refreshing to have McAfee Internet Security which is much more user friendly in that it allows the user to select options that limit the intrusiveness of the product. It appears to provide excellent protection from viruses and spyware while allowing me to use applications without being rudely interrupted.
customer_reviews.author: Charles A. Hammonds

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone knows how this items works to help keep there computer safe. Did just what I ordered it for and did it well.
customer_reviews.author: Snoogies

customer_reviews.title: Good Product Bad Rebate
customer_reviews.text: Pro's - Product is good and has all the features for securing internet sessions from threats and parental controls are excellent. [...]
customer_reviews.author: yesgreg23

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Smaller footprint than previous versions, though not as small as ESET NOD 32. Pretty secure so it does what it is supposed to do well though I wish it would load quicker on computer startup. For free after rebate for 3 users, can't beat the deal.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sharma

customer_reviews.title: Great Software
customer_reviews.text: This is a good easy to use software for your security needs. McAfee has been a good company over the years and I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Tracy L. Marrs

customer_reviews.title: Its good
customer_reviews.text: I just needed a basic security system for my computer and this fit the bill. There weren't any frills, just protection.
customer_reviews.author: A. Crowder

customer_reviews.title: As always, a great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought to upgrade previous version. Installed easy and the price beat my local brick & mortar stores. THis product always works well on my XP system. Installed easilly on my Vista system. Then on Windows 7 upgrade it continued to work well.
customer_reviews.author: mark IV

customer_reviews.title: Drag
customer_reviews.text: This virus program made my PC drag! I'm not even using Vista and couldn't surf or multi-task at all. Do not get.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bland

customer_reviews.title: McAfee Internet Security 2009 3-User
customer_reviews.text: This works great. I put in my family members computers and my buddy around the corner used it too. It keeps each computer clean. They are all very happy with it. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Fiore

customer_reviews.title: Good price!
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a one year subscription. Better than AOL and other websites at the time I was looking. Now I just need two other PC's for the 2 users left!
customer_reviews.author: J. Witherspoon

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: McAfee has really got a pretty good product. The internet protection seems to be effective but most importantly the day to day maintenance is relatively unobtrusive. Some of the network protections are a bit confusing but all in all a great product. The 3 user licensing makes great sense too because most people now have multiple computers in the home.
customer_reviews.author: R. Broadhead

customer_reviews.title: McAfee
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was very fast. Arrived packed well and secure. Saved alot over new price. Installation was a pain. Installed from cd which removed older version, then had to go online and download again from website to "activate". That took hours with a good connection. With dialup it would take days! The whole time com was unprotected. That's over and good 4a year.
customer_reviews.author: Lance A. Ipock

customer_reviews.title: MCFEE INTERNET SECURITY 2009 3-USER
customer_reviews.text: I GOT IT IN TIME AND IT WAS EASY TO INSTALL AND FROM THIS DAY NEVER HAD A PROBLEM WITH IT!
customer_reviews.author: CATILOW GIRL

customer_reviews.title: Absolutly wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I am using this product for more than a year now and I have purchased this again recently. I am comfortable and quite satisfied with this.
customer_reviews.author: V. Tiruchirapalli

customer_reviews.title: McAfee Internet Security review
customer_reviews.text: This software works very well for my needs. I have used McAfee and Norton Internet Security software and found them quite comparable. You won`t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: The product was a good price for the use.
customer_reviews.text: I was going to install some of the free security software available, but I found this at a good price. Also it has three licenses for my three machines. It installed fairly easily and I have not had any problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: good product, no problems
customer_reviews.text: switched from norton two years ago, glad i did. more tools than norton. works well with my home network, 3-computers.
customer_reviews.author: marc

customer_reviews.title: McAfee Internet Security 2009
customer_reviews.text: Works great as intended updates automatically McAfee is always the most trusted name is security. Uses lower resources than most other anti virus software.
customer_reviews.author: Taran

customer_reviews.title: McAfee
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I am pleased with this product. It is an older version, but that is better than the one I had.
customer_reviews.author: Janet N.

customer_reviews.title: McAffee Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install from the disc as long as the original version was uninstalled; updates are automatic. Can't recommend the online download option...
customer_reviews.author: Sheal Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because of the [...] that was offered. Little did I know that my internet provider offers this free of charge so I returned it. It also slowed down my computer considerably.
customer_reviews.author: J. Iacovangelo

customer_reviews.title: anti-virus software
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. I really like the site advisor part of the program.
customer_reviews.author: fuddy duddy

customer_reviews.title: Crashed my computer...grrrr....
customer_reviews.text: I have had McAfee protection on my computer all along, and knowing that my subscription was about to run out, I purchased the Total Protection 2009 package for 3 computers. Halfway into loading it onto my laptop, carefully following the directions - I got the Blue Screen of Death, and then the screen went blank. My son, who has a college degree in IT, has been slowly coaxing my computer back to life...but now the McAfee refuses to load. He will be talking to McAfee, and hopefully, we can get my laptop up and running and protected. But until I know what happened, I will NOT be installing the 2 other packages on any other of our computers.
customer_reviews.author: D. Masselink

customer_reviews.title: It's 10:30 pm, and why am I sitting at my computer.
customer_reviews.text: I have used McAffee for a couple of years, but this one is real junk. Since the last update, the console that allows me to stop a scan no longer appears. It scans whenever it feels like it. The infected files list in the log has a length of about 10 characters ( nothing like you have an infection in C:/Program_f. ) It gives false positives. So, why am I sitting at my computer. Well McAffee decided to scan even though it was scheduled to run at 7am. I can't stop it, and it will not let windows shut down. So, I suppose I do what I now have to do to shut down my computer - pull the plug.
customer_reviews.author: John N

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey, but good
customer_reviews.text: With all the competing products out there, including the free version of AVG, it's tough to justify shelling out this kind of money for anti-virus software. Realizing that, McAfee has loaded this with extra features. My guess is most people will only use a small number of features beyond those that run automatically, but if you have use for the parental controls, data backup, shredder, or other extras, it might be worth getting this all in one package rather than installing several apps from different companies. All in all it's good software, even if the price seems a bit high.
customer_reviews.author: Bookenator

customer_reviews.title: No go on Vista
customer_reviews.text: After moving to Vista with a new PC a year and a half ago, I continued to use McAfee. (new PC with dual AMD processors and 6 gig of RAM!). However, in the past six months or so, my PC started to experience "not responding" errors across numerous applications. I was getting ready to do a fresh OS install when I decided to try Windows OneCare. Believe it or not, this MS product (so far at least) solved my issues. Before you purchase McAfee, read up on CNET or other sites, as you will find other alternatives that do not negatively impact performance such as I experienced.
customer_reviews.author: Pghtroll

customer_reviews.title: You Can Always Trust McAfee To Protect You On The Internet
customer_reviews.text: When you find a quality name brand that lives up to the lofty expectations you have as a consumer, you should be loyal to that brand. For my computer security needs, that name will ALWAYS be McAfee. This security for my online activities is just what I needed since my computer has been acting strange lately. I'm afraid some spyware has crept onto my computer and this McAfee Internet Security 2009 software is precisely the answer I've needed. GET THIS PRODUCT and keep yourself protected from the evildoers!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Moore from Livin' La Vida Low-Carb

customer_reviews.title: Refreshingly clean program that works well on Windows 7 RC
customer_reviews.text: A long time ago I was a loyal McAfee user but I went away because their product became very bloated and really weighed down the computer. I have found this version to be light and efficient. It is not a resource hog and protects the computer well. I am running it on Windows 7 RC and it works great. It could have a few more features and user settings but overall it is quite nice.
customer_reviews.author: Bulldog Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Bugs Bugs Bugs
customer_reviews.text: As I have found with McAfee, there are always problems. This time it is "verify your subscription" message at least once a day. I have contacted McAfee via online chat 3 times and although they have tried, they have failed. I have uninstalled and reinstalled the McAfee 3 times and now given up. I will get PCcillin from now on. Have it on my other machines and it is transparent.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: McAfee Site Advisor is very helpful.
customer_reviews.text: I was a long-term McAfee user, but switched a little over a year ago to Trend Mico, based largely on reviews I read on Amazon. I did not notice any performance increases with Trend Micro, and had periodic episodes of the entire PC locking up, especially after performing a scan. I would have to unplug the unit (or remove the battery, in the case of my laptop) to restore functionality. Since I switched back to McAfee, I have had no further problems. Installation was very simple, and I especially like the Site Advisor feature. I am sticking with McAfee in the future.
customer_reviews.author: lincwake

customer_reviews.title: Ripped Off
customer_reviews.text: Purchased McAfee after using Norton for many many years. After 20 years of owning a computer I have a virus. Guess what. McAfee wants to charge me $89.99 to take care of it. I thought thats what I was paying for..them to stop viruses from getting to my computer. The date tagged on the virus file is the date I updated my virus protection. Is it a scam??
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent products across the board
customer_reviews.text: Back when we owned only one computer, McAfee was the internet utility software we used. After my husband became a certified system engineer and our home network grew to rival that of some small companies, McAfee remained the brand we counted on. We still do. This is an excellent suite and a great value for money. In a word -- well, two words -- buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Avast works as well and it is free.
customer_reviews.text: We got this product as part of the free Amazon Vine program. The product works very well but it only works on three computers. Believe it or not we have seven computers in a single household which makes this a bad buy for us. Avast has the problem that you have to keep getting a new "free" license but it does the same thing. Over time we will be able to tell if this works better than alternative products.
customer_reviews.author: My Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Best Security Suite
customer_reviews.text: I have been using McAfee security suite for more than 4 years now and I love it. I have both McAfee and Norton on different computers and prefer McAfee. It can be complicated for the inexperienced but once you know your way around this program, you will never leave. I have already gotten used to this suite and I hope they never change it.
customer_reviews.author: kite6t9

customer_reviews.title: E-Z to use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a new laptop in Sept 08 with a trial of Norton 360. I planned on purchasing it until reading reviews. I decided on McAfee instead. Very easy to use, I replaced free programs (AVG and ZoneAlarm) on our home PC with this. It seems to use less resources than they did. The parental controls are a nice bonus as well. So far I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: WildEyeWheel

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with McAfee! Easy to install, this security system will do the job without slowing your computer down to a crawl like some of the others I've tried. Not comprehensive, but focused instead on those who do a lot of internet surfing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kear

customer_reviews.title: Don't touch it...
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow! Don't buy it. I hope they rewrote the new version. Because this one took three perfectly serviceable computers running windows XP and turned them into bricks. I finally had to remove it, they were just unusable with this stuff loaded on them. I'd rather take the risks, and rely on my WAP firewall than load this crap up again.
customer_reviews.author: R. McElrath

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding product; very easy to use that works in the background. Installation is easy, as long as you have all other security programs uninstalled.
customer_reviews.author: BAR

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Please be aware that I dont want the renewal for this product. I'm not satisfied at all. Too much problems at installation process. Please DONT CHARGE ME FOR THE RENEWAL OF THIS PRODUCT. I will not accept any charge.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: McAfee Internet Security 2009 3-User
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product & tried to install it on 2 different computers & it crashed both of them. The McAfee tech people could not get it installed one one of the computers after several of them tried. My other computer is still down as I am having to order costly repair software to try & get it running again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: No Problems
customer_reviews.text: I recently switched from Kaspersky (which is also very good) to McAfee. I like McAfee just as much. No problems with loading. I especially like the "SiteAdvisor" feature. When I'm searching for a website on Google it will rate these sites with green, yellow or red. Nice. They don't give you an instruction manual in the box, but their website was fairly easy to get answers.
customer_reviews.author: Novice Tech

customer_reviews.title: McAfee Internet Security 2009 3-user
customer_reviews.text: Had no problem with installation, updating or scanning. The 1 star review is because it keep popping to activate software. I entered all the requested info when installed. When I enter to activate and enter it states I have a password. When I state I forgot password, never received any help except a case#. Totally dissatisfied with customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond L. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Mcaffee Security
customer_reviews.text: Good value on this product.It came as original install on my new computer and I extended it through Amazon at a savings
customer_reviews.author: Richard Lucas

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and I got it at a great price. Just what I needed. Worked on all my computers.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Slowed my computer WAAAAY down...
customer_reviews.text: I installed this program and my computer immediately slowed to a crawl. I ended up removing it within two days and having to do a system restore to get my computer back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Sipes

customer_reviews.title: McAfee review
customer_reviews.text: It's really good. Blocks everything suspicious. But sometimes picks up on some system files from vista which puts me in a lot of confusion!
customer_reviews.author: Mustafizur Rahman

customer_reviews.title: latest mcafee
customer_reviews.text: easy to install, much better and efficient than previous mcafee software and all that protection included in such a good price!!
customer_reviews.author: T. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Ships fast
customer_reviews.text: Product as described and received it promptly. Very happy with purchase and would use this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Smith

customer_reviews.title: not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I installed McAfee my system has been running very slow. McAfee runs to many programs at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lynn Gote Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: I received the item very quickly and it was exactly as the product stated online and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Garland

customer_reviews.title: Mcaffee Internet Security 2009
customer_reviews.text: not happy with amzn finally recieved my rebait form weeks after delivery of my security cd,weeks later well after I disposed of my proof of purchase code thus losing my $50 dollar rebait . Won't trust amzn again. The rebait should have come with the Item
customer_reviews.author: Wigberto Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Total Protection
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product over 2 years and it has been great. Always updates and my computer is safe.
customer_reviews.author: E. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Rebate not received yet
customer_reviews.text: The software works fine but the rebate is not here yet. I purchased this software partially because of its generous rebate. I am still waiting. Once I receive it I will give the product a different rating.
customer_reviews.author: CowDad

customer_reviews.title: McAfee review
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was delivered within a few days and I am a satisfied amazon shopper . Thanks
customer_reviews.author: James Tesch

product_meta.title: McAfee Internet Security 2009 3-User [OLD VERSION]
product_meta.description:
Protect yourself, your computer, your identity and your family with McAfee Internet Security 2009. With the daily emergence of new and more sophisticated Internet threats that could disrupt your digital life, you need more than a simple anti-virus program. You need McAfee Internet Security 2009 - a comprehensive, feature-rich, and simple-to-use security software. 

Identity Protection Shop, bank, and trade online safely 2-way Firewall Protection SiteAdvisor Warns about unsafe web sites SecurityCenter A security status screen with fully customizable options SystemGuards Warns when your computer shows specific behaviors that may signal virus, spyware, or hacker activity Stealth Mode Makes your computer invisible to intruders online Shredder Removes any trace of confidential files from your computer Parental Controls Data Backup Protection without Interference Watch movies or play games uninterrupted as McAfee security service intelligently defers tasks, updates, and alerts when you're in full-screen mode Minimum System Requirements Microsoft Windows 2000 (32-bit) with Service Pack 4 (SP4) or higher, XP (32-Bit) with Service Pack 1 (SP1) or higher, Vista (32 or 64-bit) 256 MB RAM or higher 800 X 600 or higher resolution 150 MB of available free drive space Internet connection Microsoft Internet Explorer 6.0 or later Optional - Mozilla Firefox 1.5 or later For up to 3 users

AMAZON.COM
With the daily emergence of new and more sophisticated Internet threats that could disrupt your digital life, you need more than a simple anti-virus program to protect yourself, your computer, your identity and your family. You need McAfee Internet Security 2009--comprehensive, feature-rich, and simple-to-use security software. 

COMPREHENSIVE, EASY-TO-USE PC AND ONLINE PROTECTION WITH POWERFUL WEB SITE SAFETY ADVISOR
When using popular search engines, McAfee SiteAdvisor's safety ratings appear next to your search results. To see more information about the web site, roll your mouse over any SiteAdvisor safety rating. Click to enlarge. 

Easy-to-use, intuitive "security console." Click to enlarge. 

New Product Features for 2009


New--Simplified Set-up
Installation is now easier and faster with improved detection and removal of malware that tries to halt the set-up 

New--Enterprise-class Anti-spam
Powerful industry-grade spam protection helps keep your inbox free from unwanted, fraudulent, offensive, and phishing emails. 

New--QuickScan
Checks for threats in the areas of your computer that are most often attacked 

New--Friendly Alerts
Provides you with easy to understand alerts regarding your protection 

New--Age Appropriate Searching
Automatically sets the proper content filtering levels of popular search engines 

Key Product Highlights


Anti-virus/Anti-spyware
Detects, blocks, and removes viruses, spyware, and adware 

Anti-phishing
Alerts you to web sites that may try to steal your identity 

Identity Protection
Helps you to shop, bank, and trade online safely 

Two-way Firewall Protection
Confidently use the Internet 24/7 knowing hackers can't get access to your PCs 

McAfee SiteAdvisor
Warns with color-coded ratings about unsafe web sites 

Other Product Features


McAfee SecurityCenter
Provides an easy-to-read security status screen and puts you in control with fully customizable options 

McAfee SystemGuards
Warns you when your computer shows specific behaviors that may signal virus, spyware, or hacker activity 

Stealth Mode
Makes your computer invisible to intruders from the Internet 

Shredder
Allows you to effectively remove any and all traces of confidential files from your computer 

Parental Controls
Allows your children to go online safely at times that you define 

Data Backup
Automatically saves copies of your most valuable files on a CD/DVD, USB, external, or network drive 

Protection without Interference
You can watch movies or play games uninterrupted as McAfee security service intelligently defers tasks, updates, and alerts when you're in full-screen mode 

The McAfee Advantage
McAfee's security products use award-winning technology, are easy to install, and come with unlimited email and chat assistance. With continuous and automatic updates, McAfee helps ensure that you are always running the most current security to combat the ever-evolving threats on the Internet for the duration of your subscription.
feature_bullets: Enterprise-class Anti-spam--Powerful industry-grade spam protection helps keep your inbox free from unwanted, fraudulent, offensive, and phishing emails
QuickScan--Checks for threats in the areas of your computer that are most often attacked
Age Appropriate Searching--Sets the proper content filtering levels of search engines
Anti-virus/Anti-spyware--Detects, blocks, and removes viruses, spyware, and adware
Anti-phishing--Alerts you to web sites that may try to steal your identity
